```{r echo = FALSE}
library(plotly)

data <- mtcars[which(mtcars$am == 1 & mtcars$gear == 4),]

plot_ly(data, x = ~wt, y = ~mpg, type = 'scatter', mode = 'markers',
        marker = list(size = 10)) %>%
  add_annotations(x = data$wt,
                  y = data$mpg,
                  text = rownames(data),
                  xref = "x",
                  yref = "y",
                  showarrow = TRUE,
                  arrowhead = 4,
                  arrowsize = .5,
                  ax = 20,
                  ay = -40)
```
